sentences: Viljastusmeetodis viiakse munarakk ja seemnerakk katseklaasis kokku.
Tegemist on meetodiga, kus rakud viiakse kunstlikult ühendada.
Arst soovitas viia läbi IVF protseduuri, kui loomulik viljastumine ei õnnestu.
context: The word 'viiakse' is the 3rd person singular/passive form of the Estonian verb 'viia', which means 'to take', 'to bring', or 'to transport'. In the context provided from the dictionary definition, it refers to the process in IVF (in vitro fertilization) where eggs and sperm cells are brought together in a laboratory setting before being transferred to the uterus. This word form indicates that someone is taking/something is being taken somewhere by an agent, though the agent is not specified in this passive construction.
